about_the_game:
Join Discord:

About "Avian Enigma"

"Avian Enigma" is a captivating visual novel set in a world where humanity stands as the last remnant of life. Follow a factory worker's unexpected journey as he rescues a bird, sparking a quirky yet romantic adventure. The arrival of a mysterious girl unveils deeper secrets that will forever change his world.

Characters


The Young Man
A weary worker at The Factory, a biotech genetic corporation. He believed animals were extinct until a fateful encounter with a living bird. Fascinated and intrigued, he's determined to uncover the truth behind this anomaly.


The Bird
A mystical creature that defies the established rules of the world.


The Girl
An enigmatic figure with a hidden connection to the uncanny bird.


Old Wang
The head of The Factory's security department, a relentless veteran committed to eliminating any uncontrollable variables that threaten production.


Robo MeowMeow
A kind of cyborg cat designed to enforce The Factory's security measures with ruthless precision.

Highlights

Immerse yourself in a mesmerizing story with breathtaking art and music by talented Gen-Z artists, "Avian Enigma" invites you into a world where secrets of the Bird come to life.

Game Duration

"Avian Enigma" offers a full-length independent story that takes approximately 45 minutes to complete. We've crafted a unique, engaging, and multi-sensory experience for players. While we believe the quality of the experience outweighs its length, we understand if some players feel differently. If you're unsatisfied with the game's duration after purchase, you can request a refund through Steam. We appreciate your time and interest in our game.

Arabic Localization

Our Arabic localization has an interesting backstory. We were fortunate to collaborate with two Palestinian friends who became refugees due to recent conflicts. Due to our limited proficiency, the Arabic version is currently at a basic level. We appreciate your understanding and are committed to improving it in future updates. If you're unsatisfied with the current Arabic translation, we accept reasonable refund requests through Steam. We kindly ask for your patience and the opportunity to improve before leaving a negative review.

Manchu translation


"Avian Enigma" may be the world's first video game with built-in full text translation in Manchu (using Möllendorff transliteration). We aim to support research on ancient, minority, and academic languages through entertainment industry projects. We're excited to share this feature with university personnel, autodidacts, and other enthusiast groups.
You can find language options on the game's homepage. We welcome inquiries from around the world and are open to offering discounts or free copies through educational programs where there's a genuine need.


Manju Gisun i Ubaliyamburengge.
Ineku talfin, eici jalan jecen de sucungga mudan i Manju Gisun(Mioweilendofo) be muyahūn i dolo sindahangge oho aise. Meni ererengge, sebjelecun i hacin de acihilara ildun de, julgei gisun, komsolinggū irgeten i gisun, tacin i gisun be sibkire be wehiyere, yongkiyangga tacikū i urse, beye tacire urse, gūwa amurasi sade acalara cihangga.
Ede huwekiyeci, talfin i da bofaha de 'Gisun' sere sonjon de sonjoci ombi.
Gubci jalan i dacilanjirengge be, be gemu urgunjeme okdombi. Aika baibure mujangga oci, be ere talfin be tacibure hacin obufi, hūda bukdafi eici fayabun akū obufi bure.

short_description: Avian Enigma is a sci-fi visual novel game featuring in a world where birds have become extinct. The story begins with a young man working in a factory accidentally saves a bird. Soon, a girl who has a mysterious relationship with birds appears in front of him. A romance with a tiny twist begins.
